name: Alchemist (itch) (Mr_H00die)
description:
made for jamdna #15 within 96 h

Controls

W A S D - moving

K - jumping

J - using potions

Endless runner:

You run away from endless tsunami of Chemicals called L.O.V.E.

It'll never end.

Hyperactive:

Main character is hyperactive in design. He can't stop running.

Happy:

Main character created potion of love. Unfortunately explosion occours in his lab and this potion is highly contagious. After touching it, you fall in love with everything in sight,

8 bit chiptune

i used bfxr sound effect to create basic sounds

for music i used:

https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/160422/more-chiptune-128bpm-8bit-chiptune-synth-loop

https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/109644/lil-uzi-vert-type-loop-by-dripchord-free-140bpm-trap-synth-loop

assets were made by me.
